result.eng: They were standing in the middle of the street, handing out leaflets.
result.ga: Bhí siad ina seasamh i lár na sráide ag scaipeadh bileog
result.orig: Bhí siad ina seasamh i lár na sráide ag scaipeadh bileog
result.html: Bhí siad ina seasamh i lár na sráide ag scaipeadh bileogThey were standing in the middle of the street, handing out leaflets.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ina seasaṁ i lár na sráide ag scaipeaḋ bileogThey were standing in the middle of the street, handing out leaflets.

result.eng: You will have to pay for parking on the side of the street.
result.ga: Beidh ort íoc as páirceáil ar thaobh na sráide
result.orig: Beidh ort íoc as páirceáil ar thaobh na sráide

result.ponchtml: Beiḋ ort íoc as páirceáil ar ṫaoḃ na sráideYou will have to pay for parking on the side of the street.

result.eng: I met her in the street.
result.ga: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráid
result.orig: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráid
result.html: Bhuail mé léi ar an tsráidI met her in the street.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail mé léi ar an tsráidI met her in the street.

result.eng: I saw her coming towards me across the street.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráide
result.orig: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráide
result.html: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráideI saw her coming towards me across the street.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í agus í ag teaċt ċugam trasna na sráideI saw her coming towards me across the street.

result.ga: Thit sí as a seasamh ar an tsráid
result.orig: Thit sí as a seasamh ar an tsráid
result.html: Thit sí as a seasamh ar an tsráidShe collapsed on the street.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit sí as a seasaṁ ar an tsráidShe collapsed on the street.

result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí ar Shráid na hEaglaise
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí ar Shráid na hEaglaise

result.html: Téigh síos an tsráidGo down the street.

result.eng: I live in number three, High Street, apartment two.

result.eng: I love to go to a play in the Taibhdhearc theater on Middle Street.

result.eng: Isn't it on the corner of Cross Street and Quay Street?

result.eng: Your house is on this street.

result.eng: I will meet you on the street corner.

result.eng: The gas company's van was working in the street.
